title: 262. This Is Your Brain on Podcasts
description: Neuroscientists still have a great deal to learn about the human brain. One recent MRI study sheds some light, finding that a certain kind of storytelling stimulates enormous activity across broad swaths of the brain. The takeaway is obvious: you should be listening to even more podcasts.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
